title: Crazy Low Competition KDP Niche + FREE Keywords

Discovering new KDP low content and medium content book niches can keep our ideas fresh and can be profitable. The spot the difference KDP is one such niche. Books are making a regular income and there are some very low competition sub niches within this overall niche. We take a deep dive into the niche, look at the keywords and some usefulr suggestions and resources on creating the interiors to get the book ready for publication on Amazon.
